title: Sticky black rice pudding
ingredients: ['250 g (9 oz) glutinous black rice', '750 ml (1 pint 7 fl oz) skimmed milk', '3-4 tablespoons palm sugar, soft light brown sugar or clear honey', '90 ml (3 fl oz) coconut cream', 'Grated zest of 1 lime', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '1 tablespoon orange flower water, optional', 'To serve: slices of ripe mango, optional']
